resources.string:
"This app helps you keep track of your drinks and estimates your Blood Alcohol Content (BAC)

" "Just a reminder, this is only an estimate of your BAC based on sex, weight, number of drinks and time elapsed

" "There are other factors such as food intake, genes, etc.

" "Please Never Drink and Drive

" "For more info about the signs associated with different BAC levels, please click here
